welcome_message_body: Welcome to Fujimino, Japan! This charming city is known for its beautiful parks, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Fujimino has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Johbe (讃岐うどん 條辺)
restaurants.description: Johbe (讃岐うどん 條辺) is a udon restaurant located in ふじみ野市.
restaurants.address: 上福岡1-7-9, ふじみ野市, 埼玉県, 356-0004

restaurants.name: ラーメン そら
restaurants.description: ラーメン そら is a ramen restaurant located in ふじみ野市.

restaurants.name: The Flying Garden (フライングガーデン 上福岡店)
restaurants.description: The Flying Garden (フライングガーデン 上福岡店) is a steakhouse located in ふじみ野市.
restaurants.address: 中福岡270-1, ふじみ野市, 埼玉県, 356-0013

restaurants.name: Ton Q (とんQ)
restaurants.description: Ton Q (とんQ) is a tonkatsu restaurant located in ふじみ野市.
restaurants.address: 鶴ヶ舞3-7-5, ふじみ野市, 埼玉県, 356-0041

restaurants.name: ぽんぽこ亭
restaurants.description: ぽんぽこ亭 is a unagi restaurant located in 川越市.
